name: EncodeDataDict
summary: Simple object passed to encodeData to encode data into a Titanium.Buffer.

properties.name: dest
properties.summary: The Titanium.Buffer to receive the encoded data

properties.name: destPosition
properties.summary: The position in dest to set the encoded data (optional, default is 0)

properties.name: source
properties.summary: The data to encode (see 'type' for supported object types)

properties.name: type
properties.summary:
The data type of the source object:

  • TYPE_BASE64STRING - source is a base64 encoded string
  • TYPE_HEXSTRING - source is a hexadecimal formatted string
  • TYPE_BLOB - source is a Titanium.Blob object
